name: Invasion (itch) (Thaer402)
description:
This is my 2D shooter project.

For the web GL you need to refresh the page after clicking play. thank you

Modifications:

  1. Created a new background using adobe illustrator.
  2.  Created a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  3. Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game.
  4. Added an instructions page
  5. I added a boss and modified his settings 

For the web GL you need to refresh the page after clicking play
